channel.title: SQLite on Shoals
channel.description: Recent content in SQLite on Shoals

item.title: Land ho!
item.description: Mapbox is occasionally referred to - not uncharitably - as “The Tile Company”. It’s true; we deal with big amounts of data, and the most common map/reduce unit we use is the old standby Mercator/XYZ tile. My past and present colleagues have built some really cool tools to make these patterns easier - witness mercantile and supermercado, for example - but sometimes there’s a specific problem to solve ad-hoc. In this case:
